post.title: Cheap CS:GO Skins: Enhance Your Arsenal Under $1
post.excerpt: CS:GO is one of the most popular first-person shooters in the world, and one of the many reasons for its popularity is a wide range of cosmetic items which add flair to the gaming experience. While many high-priced weapon finishes are extremely valua
post.content_html:
CS:GO is one of the most popular first-person shooters in the world, and one of the many reasons for its popularity is a wide range of cosmetic items which add flair to the gaming experience. While many high-priced weapon finishes are extremely valuable and sought after, affordable skins are also available in the market, and they are worth your attention.

This article showcases thirty incredible cheap CS:GO skins under $1, proving that price doesn’t always determine the quality and that upgrading your arsenal without necessarily burning a hole in your pocket is possible.

In article you will find:

  • Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $0.25
  • AUG | Tom Cat MW
  • Galil AR | Destroyer
  • P90 | Off World
  • Desert Eagle | Blue Ply
  • P250 | Cassette
  • Glock-18 | Clear Polymer
  • FAMAS | Crypsis
  • MP7 | Mischief
  • Five-SeveN | Scrawl
  • MAG-7 | Foresight
  • Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $0.50
  • AK-47 | Uncharted
  • AWP | Capillary
  • M4A4 | Poly Mag
  • MAC-10 | Monkeyflage
  • MP9 | Modest Threat
  • P90 | Freight
  • P250 | Re.built
  • Glock-18 | Catacombs
  • SG 553 | Bleached
  • Five-SeveN | Violent Daimyo
  • Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $1
  • AUG | Amber Fade FT
  • Galil AR | Connexion
  • M4A1-S | Boreal Forest
  • MAC-10 | Allure
  • MP9 | Featherweight
  • Desert Eagle | Trigger Discipline
  • USP-S | Ticket to Hell
  • P250 | Contaminant
  • SG 553 | Cyberforce
  • Where To Get Cheap CS:GO Skins?
  • To Wrap Up!

Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $0.25

Being in the market for a nice CS:GO skin while on an extremely tight budget might be upsetting and challenging. But fear not, as we have found every stylish skin that sells for less than $0.25 and is worth every penny.

AUG | Tom Cat MW

“Thunderstorms are nature’s purr.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Gunsmith.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.80.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

AUG | Tom Cat is a must-have skin for your inventory if you are a cat person. An image of an angry cat’s head adorns the buttstock part of the weapon, and there is a “THUNDERSTORM” inscription made in graffiti style below it.

Galil AR | Destroyer

“Destroy them all.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.70.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The black-and-beige Galil AR | Destroyer features a linear design pattern with stripes that extend from the letters of the distorted “DESTROYER” inscription on the rifle. The barrel is complemented with the same word and a QR code.

P90 | Off World

“This topcoat may never dry…”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.75.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

P90 is an affordable alternative to assault rifles for semi-buy rounds, and your inventory will not be complete without an eye-catching skin for this SMG. P90 | Off World is one of the best finishes for this weapon to enhance your inventory without breaking the bank.

Desert Eagle | Blue Ply

“WARNING: This is a replica and has not been tested with live ammunition.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Desert Eagle is a multipurpose pistol, perfect for eco rounds and as a secondary weapon for snipers. Even though Desert Eagle | Blue Ply is only a Mil-Spec skin, it is vibrant and appealing for its price.

P250 | Cassette

“Check the tape.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.60.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The design of the custom-painted P250 | Cassette is inspired by the 90s aesthetics, the style of video cassette packaging in particular. If you want a P250 skin that is both extremely affordable and striking, this is the one to go for.

Glock-18 | Clear Polymer

“What you see is what you get.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Gunsmith.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Glock-18 | Clear Polymer is one of the most unique finishes among the best and cheap CS:GO skins under $1. All components of the pistol, except for the slide, which is painted beige, are covered with a translucent polymer material.

FAMAS | Crypsis

“Take a second look.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Spray-Paint.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.55.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

If you suffer from Entomophobia, just scroll further. FAMAS | Crypsis features a camouflage-styled pattern that is actually “infested” with insects hiding under leaves, and it is a great option for seekers of affordable FAMAS skins.

MP7 | Mischief

“Up to no good.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.10 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

MP7 | Mischief is a community-made skin with a red basecoat and a concerning black-and-white smile painted over the body of the weapon. Perfect for implementing your mischievous lurking plans in-game.

Five-SeveN | Scrawl

“The first and the last.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The yellow-and-teal Five-SeveN | Scrawl is probably the best skin for this pistol within the given budget. It is covered in bold hand-painted images, including a skull, a flying person, a red eye, various icons, and an “ALPHA AND OMEGA” inscription.

MAG-7 | Foresight

“I’ve got a good feeling about this….”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.70.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

If you saw videos with animals predicting the outcomes of the matches, you know what’s going on here. MAG-7 | Foresight features an octopus motif that seems to be asked to predict the result of the match, and it is reaching for the “win” tablet. This skin might become your lucky charm!

Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $0.50

Now that we have found what are the best skins that sell for less than $0.25, let’s raise the stakes and take a closer look at those that cost $0.50 or less.

AK-47 | Uncharted

“A predator is a predator, no matter the environment.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.75.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

AK-47 is the most popular weapon in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and almost no eye-catching finishes for this rifle cost less than $1. However, an AK-47 skin is still a must-have for your inventory, so AK-47 | Uncharted is just what you need if you are looking for cheap yet stylish AK-47 finishes.

If you are willing to invest a little more in your AK-47 skin, we have a list of the best AK-47 skins under $10 . Be sure to check it out!

AWP | Capillary

“The key to an agent’s heart costs $4750.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.05 to 0.70.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Created by M03H, AWP | Capillary is a Mil-Spec for the most popular sniper rifle in the game, and it is one of the few appealing skins that you can get for less than $0.50. The background of the weapon’s body features a design of intertwining teal and coral veins that are “attached” to the heart motif hidden in the magazine.

M4A4 | Poly Mag

“Standard operating procedure.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The design concept of M4A4 | Poly Mag is similar to Glock-18 | Clear Polymer. However, the implementation is still different, as the only part of the M4A4 that is made from translucent polymer material is the magazine. The body of the assault rifle is untouched and complemented with a hand-written blue “ACE” inscription.

MAC-10 | Monkeyflage

“Spunky monkeys!”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The cartoon-styled MAC-10 | Monkeyflage was created by Jimmba, and it is a part of the Recoil Case. The whole submachine gun is embellished with a pattern showcasing multiple monkeys amidst lush tropical flora. The color palette consists of diverse green, beige, and red hues.

MP9 | Modest Threat

“Be the last 01 standing.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Gunsmith.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.75.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

MP9 | Modest Threat has been hand-painted in a futuristic style. The body of the submachine gun is covered with embossed metal sheets, partially coated in worn orange paint. Two inscriptions, “Mission” and “01”, enhance the design.

P90 | Freight

“Art is not vandalism.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Gunsmith.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

P90 | Freight from the Fracture Case resembles a train car irregularly coated in deep hues of red and brown, accompanied by a design that mimics a rust layer. The background is embellished with a range of graffiti writings and illustrations.

P250 | Re.built

“Ninth time’s the charm.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.90.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

P250 | Re.built is a part of the Revolution Case, and this skin was created by Wonder Bit. The minimalistic design of the pistol body is adorned with geometric patterns, including stripes and triangles, and also several inscriptions.

Glock-18 | Catacombs

“Intimidation is the sincerest form of flattery.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Anodized Multicolored.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.50.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

The slide of the Glock-18 | Catacombs features a motif of multiple realistic human skulls in dark shades of grey. There is also a non-violent version of this skin which has several gas masks painted on it instead of skulls.

SG 553 | Bleached

“All that remains.”

Rarity: Consumer Grade.

Finish Style: Spray-Paint.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.50.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

SG 553 | Bleached is a spooky Valve-made skin that is decorated with a pattern of arbitrarily dispersed animal skulls. The color palette of this skin incorporates multiple hues of beige and brown.

Five-SeveN | Violent Daimyo

“How will you rule?.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.70.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Created by The Honey Badger, Five-SeveN | Violent Daimyo features a grayish-purple color palette and is embellished with a number of geometric designs. There are also small icons that resemble intersecting swords and samurai helmets on the skin.

Best Cheap CS:GO Skins Under $1

If you have $1 only to spend on a CS:GO skin, finding a finish that will stand out might be challenging, especially if you are looking for a skin in a specific style or to match a specific weapon. However, there still are a few 1 dollar skins in CS:GO worth checking out, and we gathered all ten of them here. Keep reading to find out which ones are the best.

AUG | Amber Fade FT

“This isn’t just a weapon, it’s a conversation piece – Imogen, Arms Dealer In Training.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Anodized Airbrushed.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.40.

StatTrak™ is available: no.

AUG | Amber Fade is a Valve-made skin that was released as a part of the 2021 Train Collection. It features a chromed gradient pattern in orange, green, and yellow hues.

Galil AR | Connexion

“They’re bringing in the big guns.”

Rarity: Restricted.

Finish Style: Gunsmith.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.80.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Created by VLEK and hexeth, Galil AR | Connexion has a white and red base, over which the authors applied logos of the Phoenix Connexion faction, the oldest terrorist faction in the history of the series from Eastern Europe.

M4A1-S | Boreal Forest

“The woods can be a dangerous place… never travel alone.”

Rarity: Industrial Grade.

Finish Style: Hydrographic.

Float value range: 0.06 to 0.80.

StatTrak™ is available: no.

M4A1-S | Boreal Forest is a Valve-made skin that was released in 2013, and its design showcases a forest camouflage pattern applied using a hydrographic technique. It’s a rather simple but stylish CS:GO skin.

MAC-10 | Allure

“Beauty begets bloodshed.”

Rarity: Restricted.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

One of the best 1-dollar MAC-10 skins a CS:GO player can get is MAC-10 | Allure , a skin from the Fracture Case. Its design is inspired by the traditional Japanese painting style, and a woman dressed in teal, believed to represent Iso Onna, is depicted standing in front of koi fish and turbulent waves.

MP9 | Featherweight

“A good marksman doesn’t blame their tools.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 1.00.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

MP9 | Featherweight is one of the submachine gun skins presented in the Revolution Case. The weapon has been uniquely painted in black and white, giving it a sponge-like appearance that contributes to a lighter weight for the user.

Desert Eagle | Trigger Discipline

“Patience is its own reward.”

Rarity: Restricted.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.97.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

Our list of the best CS:GO skins under $1. would not be complete without Desert Eagle | Trigger Discipline . The barrel of the pistol features a custom pink isometric design, while the hammer and front sight are adorned with vibrant blue paint.

USP-S | Ticket to Hell

“Designer death.”

Rarity: Restricted.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.76.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

USP-S | Ticket to Hell comes from the Revolution Case released at the beginning of 2023, and it was created by Supremat. The pistol’s frame is solid black, adorned with white text, icons, barcodes, and QR codes. A large, sharp-toothed mouth is painted above the handle.

P250 | Contaminant

“It’s only as bad as it looks.”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.70.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

P250 | Contaminant is a great-looking skin that makes an astonishing combo with Moto Gloves | Blood Pressure. The pistol’s body is decorated with a pattern resembling decomposing organic matter, featuring dark red hues.

SG 553 | Cyberforce

“CYBERFORCE INC: We secure your future so you don’t have to!”

Rarity: Mil-Spec.

Finish Style: Custom Paint Job.

Float value range: 0.00 to 0.90.

StatTrak™ is available: yes.

SG 553 | Cyberforce is a community-made skin released within the Revolution Case. The receiver of this assault rifle is adorned with a red-and-black abstract geometric design and includes white “CYBER FORCE” lettering.

Where To Get Cheap CS:GO Skins?

The price of cheap CS:GO skins is influenced by a variety of factors, including rarity, condition, demand, and supply. These factors can cause the value of a skin to fluctuate over time, making the CS:GO skin market dynamic and constantly changing.

Oftentimes, the CS:GO skin market is manipulated and becomes floated with overpriced cosmetic items. Not long ago, prices of CS:GO cases on the Steam Market skyrocketed due to the official Counter-Strike 2 announcement, and it is worth checking out third-party CS:GO case opening websites like Hellcase for the best.

On Hellcase, you can find hundreds of affordable exclusive weapon skin cases featuring valuable cosmetic items waiting on you. We offer plenty of $1 CS:GO cases that drop rare skins. For example, our Duelist CS:GO Case costs only $0.65, and opening it can grant you MAC-10 | Fade, which costs more than $50!

To Wrap Up!

We hope you did enjoy our list of the best cheap CS:GO skins under $1 and saved a skin or two for your inventory upgrade, as we did our best scouring the market for hidden gems that will enhance your gaming experience while being budget-friendly.

Explore our blog for more interesting articles about CS:GO skins and other cosmetic items, in-depth game guides, and esports news. Stay tuned, gamer!
